titles.title: Expedited Delivery of Airport Infrastructure Act of 2020
To amend title 49, United States Code, to permit the use of incentive payments to expedite certain federally financed airport development projects.
Expedited Delivery of Airport Infrastructure Act of 2020
Expedited Delivery of Airport Infrastructure Act of 2020
Expedited Delivery of Airport Infrastructure Act of 2020
Expedited Delivery of Airport Infrastructure Act of 2020

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Aviation.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.
Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.
Reported by the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure. H. Rept. 116-464.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 372.

action.text: Mr. Carbajal moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 5912.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary:
Expedited Delivery of Airport Infrastructure Act of 2020
This bill makes incentive payments incurred for expedited completion of certain federally financed airport development projects an allowable project cost standard.
